UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Venom peptides from solitary hunting wasps induce feeding disorder in lepidopteran larvae.
Literature.Author: Baek JH, Ji Y, Shin JS, Lee S, Lee SH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 11775(MIC=100µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 12600(MIC=50µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=100µM),Botrytis cinerea(MIC=5µM),Lymantria dispar FB cells(EC50=28µM),Spodoptera frugiperda ovarian Sf9 cells(EC50=60µM)
